#blastn \
#  -db /export/databases/blast/nt \
#  -query testInputs/blasto.fasta \
#  -task "megablast" \
#  -evalue 30000 \
#  -word_size 7 \
#  -max_hsps 100 \
#  -max_target_seqs 50000 \
#  -num_threads 30 \
#  -reward 1 \
#  -penalty -1 \
#  -gapopen 2 \
#  -gapextend 1 \
#  -outfmt "7 qseqid sgi evalue length qlen sstart send slen score sscinames scomnames qseq sseq" \
#  > testOutGapped.txt

  
blastn \
  -db /export/databases/blast/nt \
  -query testInputs/blasto.fasta \
  -task "blastn" \
  -evalue 30000 \
  -word_size 7 \
  -max_hsps 100 \
  -max_target_seqs 50000 \
  -num_threads 30 \
  -reward 1 \
  -penalty -1 \
  -gapopen 2 \
  -gapextend 1 \
  -outfmt "7 qseqid sgi evalue length qlen sstart send slen score bitscore sscinames scomnames qseq sseq sstrand" \
  -ungapped \
  -sum_stats true \
  > testOutUngappedBlastn.txt
